Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Positive limit switch warning.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis has been moved to the positive limit switch.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please move the axis away from the positive limit switch.

Detail.Name: Description

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please move the axis away from the negative limit switch.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Amplifier overload utilisation warning level has reached.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Amplifier overload utilisation is greater than warning level in P316.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The motor temperature has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0204"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the motor temperature exceeds the parametrized value of IDN "S-0-0204", the servo driver will turn off with error "FD07".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The motor is about to overheat.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The motor load has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the motor load exceeds a critical value, the servo driver will turn off with error "FD17".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The motor is just below the overload limit.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The load of the internal brake resistor has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the utilization of the internal brake resistor continues to increase, it will be automatically limited by reducing the braking current and the voltage in the DC link can continue to increase, to the point where the servo driver turns off with error "FD4F".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The internal brake resistor is just below the overload limit. If the limit value is exceeded, the brake resistor will be turned off and the internal ballast power will be lost.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The load of the external brake resistor has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the load of the external brake resistor continues to increase, it will be turned off and the voltage in the DC link can continue to increase, to the point where the servo driver turns off with error "FD4F".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The external brake resistor is just below the overload limit. If the limit value is exceeded, the brake resistor will be turned off and the internal ballast power will be lost.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The servo driver temperature has reached a critical value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you ignore this warning and the servo driver temperature continues to increase, the servo driver will turn off with error "FD4D".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The servo driver is about to overheat.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The DC link voltage has not yet reached the default value.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the DC link voltage does not reach the default value, the servo driver is not ready for use or turns off during operation with the error "FD4B".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The DC link has not been loaded yet.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: U_mains too high

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the DC link voltage does not reach the default value, the servo driver is not ready for use or turns off during operation with the error "FD4B".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The DC link has not been loaded yet.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: U_mains too low

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the DC link voltage does not reach the default value, the servo driver is not ready for use or turns off during operation with the error "FD4B".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The DC link has not been loaded yet.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The feedback system has diagnosed a warning and set the warning bit.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Internal warning of the feedback system.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The feedback system has diagnosed a battery warning.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Battery voltage is under warinig threshold. Position is valid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Next time change battery when drive is in Op! Then the feedback position is continue valid. To clear the warning set flag "Reset feedback battery warning" in P-0357 for one PreOp to SafeOp transition. After that clear flag "Reset feedback battery warning" in P-0-0357.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Testwarning, triggered with P-0-0310.

Detail.Name: Description

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Internal firmware file is defective

Detail.Text: The internal firmware file is defective.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The current firmware version can be found in the TCDriveManager under Device Info.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Re-load the same firmware file to the AX5000, disconnect the servo drive from mains (incl. 24 V supply voltage) and try again. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Internal system data file not found

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The internal system data file not found.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If the system data file is no longer available, the following data are no longer available: Error history, EtherCAT address, Device identifier and Modulo data.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Ask our support.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The general initialization of the serial flash memory has failed.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Serial flash error: Diagnostics file not found

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The diagnostics messages file could not be found.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The serial flash don't contains the required file.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Install an actual firmware file.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Processing of the diagnostics messages: internal error

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An EtherCAT communication error occurred during active axis control.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The axis state machine has reverted to the "Control and power section ready" state due to an EtherCAT communication error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: The PC is defective; there is an EMC problem; problems with the EtherCAT cabling; synchronization problems (distributed clocks)

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An attempt was made to activate an uninitialized operating mode.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An attempt was made to select an uninitialized operating mode with the control word S-0-0134.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Initialize the desired operating mode.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Loss of the hardware enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The configured hardware enable input (plug X06) has been deactivated by an external event, even though the AX5000 was under control.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0400"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Problems with the digital inputs (Connector "X06").
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the digital inputs (Connector "X06").

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Got no timer

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: A timer is not available.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0400"

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unknown hard- or software error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call the Beckhoff branch office that is responsible for you.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: NC error handling - Timeout

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: With NC error handling activated (P-0-0350), the AX5000 was not stopped by the NC within the parametrized time period (P-0-0351).

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0350" and "P-0-0351"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The selected time period is too short.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Increase the time period if your application allows this.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The movement is too complex for the parametrized time period.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Program a movement that is suitable for the time period.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Maximum drive off delay time elapsed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The controlled stopping of the AX5000 in the event of an error or via the axis state machine is monitored with the time from the IDN "S-0-0273". The AX5000 could not be stopped within the parametrized time.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0273"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized time period is too short.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Increase the time period, if the application allows this.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An unrecognized commutation error has occurred.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: No motor configured

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An attempt was made to enable the axis, even though no motor is configured.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0053"

CauseRemedy.Cause: No motor is configured.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Configure a motor.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Current control not ready to enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The current controller is not ready to enable when selecting the operating mode "Position , velocity or torque control".

CauseRemedy.Cause: It is no valid commutation angle present.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Assign a commutation angle.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Velocity control not ready

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The velocity controller is not ready to enable when selecting the operating mode "Position or velocity control".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback position is invalid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Position control not ready

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The position controller is not ready to enable when selecting the operating mode "Position or velocity control".

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback position is invalid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis state machine: Wake and Shake not idle

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The Wake and Shake command could not be executed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: Wake and Shake command failed

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The execution of the Wake and Shake command has failed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error belongs to the group of the higher-level errors and always occurs together with other errors, which contain the causal problem.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the other diagnostic messages to identify the causal problem.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: Not possible to enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The axis is in calibration mode and cannot be started.

CauseRemedy.Cause: You have started the internal calibration mode.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disable the internal calibration mode.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: Not possible to enable

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The control loops of the axis are used by internal technology functions.

CauseRemedy.Cause: One or more control loops are in use by a technology or by an internal function.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Don't try to enable the axis while one of this functions is active.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: The motor connection check failed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The check of the motor connection failed.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: The configured error propagation input isn't active.
{0}{1,X}{2} Axis State Machine: The motor management isn't ready to enable. E.g. P-0-0093 is zero.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The timeout of the command "Autotuning" elapsed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is an internal software error.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Disconnect the servo drive from the mains (including the 24 V power supply) and start a new attempt. If this error occurs repeatedly, please call our support.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Permissible movement exceeded.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The system is unstable.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Ensure a stable system. May adjust control loop parameters manually until the system behaves stable.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The "Base velocity amplitude" is too high for the permissibled movement.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: May adjust "Base velocity amplitude" or the permissible movements.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: This command can only be executed by one axis at the same time.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This command cannot be executed simultaneously by two axes.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Execute the command for each axis one after the other.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": Wrong velocity controller cycle time

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The velocity ctrl cycle time (P-0-0003) has to be 62 us to use this command.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parameter P-0-0003 Velocity ctrl cycle time is not equal 62 us.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Set the parameter P-0-0003 Velocity ctrl cycle time to 62 us.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The command "Autotuning" is not supported in this firmware version.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": No enable permission from the safety option

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The "Check motor and feedback connection" command has failed because there is no enable permission from the safety option.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The command is executed, but the safety card has been activated by a malfunction in the safety zone of the machine/plant.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Rectify the malfunction in the safety zone of the machine/plant and perform a reset.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The command is executed, but the safety card has been activated by a cable breakage in the 24 V supply to the card.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Rectify the cable breakage and perform a reset.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The execution of the "Autotuning" command has failed because the configured hardware enable is missing.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The hardware enable of the corresponding terminal point on plug "X06" is missing.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Apply the hardware enable (IDN P-0-0400).

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Command "Autotuning": Current controller is not ready to enable.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The command "Autotuning" can't be executed because the current controller is not ready to enable.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->Commutation methods" and AX5000_IDN-Description-->P-0-0160.

CauseRemedy.Cause: No valid commutation offset.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: See operating instructions

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} The advanced parametrization introduced with firmware version 2.10 is required.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The advanced parametrization introduced with firmware version 2.10 is required.

CauseRemedy.Cause: It is NOT recommended to use a parametrization ('startup list') created for a firmware version less than v2.10!
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Use an appropriate TcDriveManager to create a new parametrization ('startup list'). Please contact the support if this isn't possible.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Initialization of the feedback: No option card found

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An attempt was made during the feedback initialization to use the option card, even though this is not present.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150" or "P-0-0180"

CauseRemedy.Cause: AX570x option card is not inserted or is defective.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Insert or exchange the card.

CauseRemedy.Cause: You have selected the AX570x option card by mistake during the parametrization of the feedback system IDN "P-0-0150" or "P-0-0180".
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Change the parametrization of the feedback system.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback error: Plug connector combination invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The process and parameter data cannot be processed with the selected plug connector combination.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The process and parameter data of a feedback systems are not processed with X11 and X21, but in a combination of X11, X21 with X41, X42 (encoder option card).
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Always process the data of a feedback systems with X11, X21 or X41, X42, i.e. either with the connectors on the front or with the connectors on the encoder option card.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Feedback error: No OCT support.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The AX5000 hardware doesn't support the OCT interface. The serial number of the AX5000 is below 105 000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the AX5000 with one with a serial number greater than 105 000.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Over-current error motor, measuring limit reached (X13 / X23).

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The drive software detected an over-current on the motor phases. The limit of the current measuring range was reached.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error depends on the total system configured:
CauseRemedy.Remedy: The solution depends on the total system configured:

CauseRemedy.Cause: Synchronous motor, current-controlled with absolute position information per pole pair.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the current controller.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Synchronous motor, current-controlled with incremental feedback.
Synchronous motor, current-controlled without feedback
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the current controller.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Asynchronous motor with feedback.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the current controller and the IDNs P-0-0107 and S-0-0106.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Asynchronous motor without feedback.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the load conditions and if necessary activate the acceleration controller (IDNs P-0-0112, P-0-0113, P-0-0114 and P-0-0451) and/or the breakdown protection controller (IDNs P-0-0115, P-0-0116, P-0-0117 and P-0-0451).

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset invalid: The Feedback-System has been exchanged.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The saved position offset is invalid because the serial number of the encoder has changed. E.g. a different motor has been connect.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Calibrate the axis and save the new position offset.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset: No position offset existing

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset: No position offset existing

CauseRemedy.Cause: A position offset should used in the position control loop, but no position offset has been saved.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Calibrate the axis and save the new position offset.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset: Offset can't be activated. Modulo calculation is active.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset: Offset can't be activated. Modulo calculation is active.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The position offset can't be activated because the modulo calculation is enabled.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Activate the position offset before enabling the modulo calculation.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The position offset can't be activated because the modulo calculation is enabled.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Update the AX5000 firmware to a version 2.06 or higher.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset: No position offset existing

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset: No position offset existing

CauseRemedy.Cause: A position offset should used in the position control loop, but no valid position offset has been found.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Calibrate the axis and save the new position offset.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Position offset: The position offset change is greater than the modulo value.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Position offset: The position offset change is greater than the modulo value.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The position offset can't be activated because the modulo calculation is enabled and the modulo value is less than the position offset change.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Use only position offset changes less than the modulo value.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Modulo Calculation: The absolute range of encoder 1 is too small.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The modulo calculation with data storage can only be used if a multi-turn feedback is connected.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Connect and use a multi-turn feedback as feedback 1.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Connect and use a multi-turn feedback as feedback 2.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The cycle time of Sync0 is parametrized to an invalid value.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_Operating-Instructions - Chapter "Commissioning-->EtherCAT-Synchronization"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The configuration of the "distributed clocks" is optimally set as standard by the TwinCAT system and should be ready to run without any problems. Any changes that may be required should only be carried out by well-trained specialists.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The cycle time of Sync0 may only be configured at 62.5 µs, 125 µs or 250 µs.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cycle time of Sync0.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check the task prioritization.

Detail.Name: Description

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Rotatory: "Bit resolution single-turn position" / "Number of clock cycles to get single-turn position" over 32 bit.
Rotatory: "Bit resolution multi-turn position" / "Number of clock cycles to get multi-turn position" over 16 bit.
Linear: "Bit resolution single-turn position" / "Number of clock cycles to get single-turn position" over 48 bit.
Linear: "Bit resolution multi-turn position" over 16 bit or "Number of clock cycles to get multi-turn position" over 0 bit.

Detail.Text: The initialization of the feedback parameter channel has failed. The digital name plate could not be read (EnDat).

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150" and "P-0-0180"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: A digital name plate exists only in Beckhoff motors from the AM3000 series.

CauseRemedy.Cause: On the basis of the parametrization of the IDN P-0-0150 or P-0-0180, check whether you have parametrized the IDN to match the feedback system.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The initialization of the feedback parameter channel has failed. The resolution of the position value is >32 bit (EnDat) for "single-turn".

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150-->Parameter channel-->Bit resolution single-turn position" and "P-0-0180-->Parameter channel-->Bit resolution single-turn position"

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The AX5000 supports a max. position value resolution of 32 bits (EnDat) with "single-turn".

CauseRemedy.Cause: Check the parametrization of the resolution in the IDN P-0-0150 or P-0-0180.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Change the parametrization if necessary.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Defective feedback system, parametrized internal resolution is too high.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the feedback system.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The parameterizing of the feedback system was faulty.

CauseRemedy.Cause: IDN P-0-0152 or P-0-0182 "gear numerator" and P-0-0153 or P-0-0183 "gear denominator"
CauseRemedy.Remedy: This parameter must be greater than 0
The result of this division must be greater than 1024
The result of this division must be greater than 1024
Die Parameter "Resolution per rotation; Length pro signal period; Linear resolution" must be greater than 0.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The feedback has an battery error. Position is not valid and must new referenced.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: P-0-0357: "Ignore and reset feedback battery error"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Battery voltage to low.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Change battery. Set Flag "Ignor and reset feedback battery error" in P-0357 for one PreOp to SafeOp transition. In Op reference the position and then clear the flag in P-0-0357.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Battery is not connected to feedback power supply.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Connect battery to feedback. Set Flag "Ignor and reset feedback battery error" in P-0357 for one PreOp to Safe=p transition. In Op reference the position and then clear the flag in P-0-0357.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: In P-0-0357 the parameterizing of the feedback system was faulty.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: P-0-0357: "Ignore and reset feedback battery error" or "Reset feedback battery warning"

CauseRemedy.Cause: IDN P-0-0357: Flag "Ignor and reset feedback battery error" is only by battery error allowed.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Clear flag "Ignor and reset for one PreOp->SafeOp transition feedback battery error" in P-0-0357.

CauseRemedy.Cause: IDN P-0-0357: Flag "Reset feedback battery warning" is only by battery warning allowed.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Clear flag "Reset for one PreOp->SafeOp transition feedback battery warning" in P-0-0357.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Contact support.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Invalid parameters "P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos": 1. Signal periods per rotation 2. Length per signal period

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0150 / P-0-0180-->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos"

CauseRemedy.Cause: Invalid parameter in IDN " P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos-->signal periods per rotation"
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180-->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos-->signal periods per rotation" must greater than 0.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Invalid parameter in IDN " P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos-->Length per signal period"
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180-->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos-->Length per signal period" must greater than 0 by linear encoder.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Invalid parameter in IDN " P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos" Multiturnlength greater than 140,737488355328km.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please check in P-0-0150 / P-0-0180 -->Process channel-->Data-->Sin / Cos: multiturnlength = "signal periods per rotation" * "length per signal period" must lower than 140,737488355328km

Detail.Text: Feedback process channel error (1Vss): quadrature encoder error

CauseRemedy.Cause: The pulse sequence of the digital traces (cosine and sine) is incorrect.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cable screening and screen connection of all cables to the devices. Check whether all components are earthed on the same potential. Check whether the AX5000 was securely attached to the metallic rear panel and whether the panel is earthed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The spacing between the edges is too small.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cable screening and screen connection of all cables to the devices. Check whether all components are earthed on the same potential. Check whether the AX5000 was securely attached to the metallic rear panel and whether the panel is earthed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The calculated value lies outside the range of tolerance (0.53 Vpp-1.34 Vpp).
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the cable screening and screen connection of all cables to the devices. Check whether all components are earthed on the same potential. Check whether the AX5000 was securely attached to the metallic rear panel and whether the panel is earthed.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Feedback error TTL: Quadrature encoder error

CauseRemedy.Cause: With some TTL feedback systems this problem occurs during the initialization phase.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Enter 500 ms as the value for the IDN P-0-0150 "Wait time after power up".

CauseRemedy.Cause: There is a large amount of interference to the feedback signal.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please analyze and remove this interference.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The feedback system is faulty.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please replace the motor.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "EtherCAT Encoder": Position init value is invalid

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The AX5000 has detected a position error.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The difference between the given position init value in P-0-0622 and the received value in P-0-0620 is to big.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Adjust the initialization value in P-0-0622.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Feedback "EtherCAT Encoder": Received status signals an error.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The AX5000 has detected a position error.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The received encoder status in P-0-0621 signals an invalid encoder value.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the transmitted values to the AX5000.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please move the axis away from the negative limit switch.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The speed of the axis is higher than the parametrized maximum value in S-0-0113

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "S-0-0113"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized maximum value was exceeded.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check whether the value of parameter S-0-0113 corresponds to the value from the technical data of the motor.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized maximum value was exceeded.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze why the motor is turning so fast and rectify this.

CauseRemedy.Cause: If the application requires a maximum value of 3000, you must set the value in S-0-0113 approx. 10% higher, so that the servo drive can adjust the 3000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the value in S-0-0113.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Commutation error; the motor accelerates in an uncontrolled fashion.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze why the commutation of the motor is not correct.

CauseRemedy.Cause: An external force is acting on the drive system.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze whether that is permissible and parameterize the drive system if necessary.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The parametrized utilization limit of the AX5000 has been reached.

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0093 and P-0-0316"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The parametrized utilization limit is too low.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Increase the limit value.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The application overloads the AX5000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Use a larger AX5000 if necessary.

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error message can be suppressed; the current is lowered to P-0-0093 on reaching the utilization limit.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Parameterize the IDN P-0-0316 accordingly.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The current limitation of the AX5000 was triggered.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The mechanical system is too sluggish.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze your application and try make the mechanical system smoother.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The application overloads the AX5000.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Use a larger AX5000 if necessary.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The use of asynchronous motors:
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the load conditions and if necessary activate the acceleration controller (IDNs P-0-0112, P-0-0113, P-0-0114 and P-0-0451) and/or the breakdown protection controller (IDNs P-0-0115, P-0-0116, P-0-0117 and P-0-0451).

CauseRemedy.Cause: This error depends on the total system configured and occurs only during the armature short circuit braking / DC braking:
CauseRemedy.Remedy: The solution depends on the total system configured.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Asynchronous motor
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the parametrization of the current controller and the IDNs P-0-0106 and S-0-0107. Analyze the load conditions during the braking procedure.

CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please enter the motor type in TcDriveManager exactly as it is shown in the electronic type label.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} ASM don't supports usage of P-0-0077

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Motor data are missing for the calculation of the motor characteristic curve.

CauseRemedy.Cause: If at least one of the following functions - speed limitation (P-0-0451), current limitation (P-0-0451) or field weakening operation (P-0-0455) - is activated, the following parameters must be valid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the following IDNs: P-0-0055; P-0-0066; P-0-0070; P-0-0073; P-0-0077 and S-0-0196 (If no rated motor current is entered, the motor standstill current is used).

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The mains voltage range entered is not permissible for the field weakening operation with synchronous motors.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The permissible range of the voltage value for the field weakening operation "U_mains-min and U_mains-max" of the IDN P-0-455 is calculated during initialization and compared with the parametrized value in the IDN P-0-0201.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: "U_mains-min" less than (P-0-0201 minus P-0-0203) and "U_mains-max" greater than (P-0-0201 plus P-0-0202). Check the IDNs for plausible values.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The parametrized current value does not correspond to the calculated value (field weakening operation).

Detail.Name: Info
Detail.Text: AX5000_IDN-Description: "P-0-0455"

CauseRemedy.Cause: The desired operating point is set in the TCDriveManager on the field weakening curve (slider). The current value resulting from this is automatically entered into the IDN P-0-0455; if this IDN is changed manually it can become invalid.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Check the IDN P-0-0455 and restart the servo drive if necessary.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Mains supply: U mains too low.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Mains supply: U mains too low.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: A power supply failure has occurred.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The mains supply is faulty.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the mains supply and rectify the fault.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: A phase of the 3-phase mains supply has failed.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: On no account should you deactivate the phase monitoring if a phase of the 3-phase mains supply has failed, as otherwise the AX5000 will be destroyed.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The mains supply is faulty.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Analyze the mains supply and rectify the fault.

CauseRemedy.Cause: You are operating the AX5000 on a single-phase mains supply.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Deactivate the phase monitoring by means of IDN P-0-0204 bit 3. If you had assumed a 3-phase mains supply during the project engineering, check in the IDN P-0-0092 and P-0-0093 whether you need to enter a derating.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The 3-phase mains supply is continually afflicted by faults.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: By means of IDN P-0-0204, activate a filter that causes the phase monitoring to wait longer before triggering the error.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Error Power Management: Wrong external brake resistor found

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The determined values of the external brake resistor connected do not correspond to the parametrized values in the TCDriveManager.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: If you have ruled out the above measurement errors, you can switch off the brake resistor check via the IDN P-0-0204 "Bit 1".

CauseRemedy.Cause: General measurement error; measure the brake resistor and compare the ohmic value determined to the data on the type label.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: If the value corresponds, deactivate the internal test of the external brake resistor: To do this, set the IDN P-0-0204 "Disable DC link interface check" to "enable". Observe the application with regard to the proper operation of the external brake resistor.

CauseRemedy.Cause: General measurement error; measure the brake resistor and compare the ohmic value determined to the data on the type label.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: If the value does not correspond, exchange the brake resistor or enter the determined ohmic value in the TCDriveManager; afterwards, switch the 24 V supply off and on again. .

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Safety switch off while the axis was enabled.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Safety switch off while the axis was enabled.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The safety logic has switched off the power stage of the drive while the axis was enabled. In this case the drive is losing the control over the motor and the motor must be mechanically stopped.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: The axis should be stopped and disabled before the safety logic triggers the power stage switch off.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The safety slot (X3x) of the AX5000 contains a safety or dummy card that is incompatible to the drive.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The hardware type of the safety option isn't compatible with the hardware of the drive. E.g. a safety card for the drive harware version 1 is inserted in a drive with hardware version 2.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Exchange the safety option to a compatible one. (For detailed information contact the Beckhoff drive support.)

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Safety card: safety card activated - internal reaction

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The safety logic has been activated and the delay time before the power stage is switched off is running. In this delay time the drive can slow down the motor with a closed loop ramp.

Detail.Name: Hint
Detail.Text: The safety card has been triggered by a certain event. Examine all safety-relevant functions of the system that could trigger such an event.

CauseRemedy.Cause: The AX5000 is in the safe state (emergency stop circuit still active, cabling fault etc.).
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Place the system in readiness for operation again.

Event.Message: {0}{1,X}{2} Safety slot: Wrong safety card AX5805 or AX5806 inserted

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: The safety slot (X3x) of the AX5000 contains a safety card (AX5805 or AX5806) that is incompatible with the device type. Please use for the AX5y01 to the AX5140 a 'AX5805' and for the AX5160 to the AX5193 a 'AX5806'.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: An internal error occurred while evaluating the compatibility of the safety card.

CauseRemedy.Cause: Internal software exception.
CauseRemedy.Remedy: Please contact the Beckhoff drive support.

Detail.Name: Description
Detail.Text: Missing implementation!
